sparc_neuron_populations.notes: SPARC connectivity only includes populations from ApINATOMY and NLP curated neuron populations. Neuron types from CUT and other evidence based models (EBM) are not considered for the SPARC project.

locational_phenotypes.notes: SPARC connectivity only includes populations from ApINATOMY and NLP curated neuron populations. Neuron types from CUT and other evidence based models (EBM) are not considered for the SPARC project.
